text: Timothy Peter Lambesis (born November 21, 1980) is an American musician, producer, and songwriter. He is best known as the founding member, lead vocalist, and the sole continuous member of the metalcore band As I Lay Dying. ==Discography== ;As I Lay Dying * Beneath the Encasing of Ashes (2001) * Frail Words Collapse (2003) * Shadows Are Security (2005) * An Ocean Between Us (2007) * The Powerless Rise (2010) * Awakened (2012) * Shaped by Fire (2019) * Through Storms Ahead (2024) ===Guest appearances=== * "To the Nines", from The Fall of Rome (2005) â€“ by Winter Solstice ==References== Category:1980 births Category:American atheists Category:American heavy metal singers Category:American people convicted of attempted murder Category:Living people Category:Record producers from California
title: Tim Lambesis
